markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Ant Haul](/Spells.aspx?ID=1442)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 315 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Aakriti](/Deities.aspx?ID=623), [Balumbdar](/Deities.aspx?ID=674), [Dolok Darkfur](/Deities.aspx?ID=606), [Droskar](/Deities.aspx?ID=447), [Dwarven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=196), [Hearth and Harvest](/Deities.aspx?ID=252), [Jukha](/Deities.aspx?ID=556), [Kurgess](/Deities.aspx?ID=351), [Stone's Blood](/Deities.aspx?ID=382)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 8 hours
</row>

</column>

---

You reinforce the target's musculoskeletal system to bear more weight. The target can carry 3 more Bulk than normal before becoming encumbered and up to a maximum of 6 more Bulk.
name: Ant Haul

<summary>

</summary>
text: Ant Haul Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 315 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Deities Aakriti, Balumbdar, Dolok Darkfur, Droskar, Dwarven Pantheon, Hearth and Harvest, Jukha, Kurgess, Stone's Blood Range touch Target 1 creature Duration 8 hours --- You reinforce the target's musculoskeletal system to bear more weight. The target can carry 3 more Bulk than normal before becoming encumbered and up to a maximum of 6 more Bulk.
